text: Ezɨ 3plan dughiar kaba otogha gɨfa. Kar iakɨnir namba 9ɨn, an aruer namba 20, Judan anabamɨn gumazamiziba ko Benjaminɨn anabamɨn gumazamiziba bar iza Jerusalemɨn otifi. Egha me Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn boroghɨn uari akuvamin danganimɨn apia. Ezɨ maburan amozim arɨki. Me osɨmtɨzir kamɨn mɨgɨrɨgɨaba baraghasa nɨghnɨgha atiatia itima, amozim iza mamaghɨra iti, ezɨ me arugharugha nɨsi.
